dellefs0,
you read my mind. I was in the middle of downloading "Moonrise Kingdom" by SiNNERS [PublicHD] at 4.3GB, and then I saw yours at 1.3GB.

http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/6206059/The_Mission_%28BDrip_1080_ENG-ITA-FRA%29_x264_bluray_%281986%29
